name: digiTALE entertainment
overview:
digiTALE entertainment is a new media company. A one-stop-shop for the development, production and marketing of digital media. digiTALE approach new media as the evolution and convergence of traditional media disciplines across multiple digital platforms.

What we do: ● Consult on digital media strategy ● Produce linear and interactive content ● Design, develop and maintain websites ● Create and implement online and social media marketing

We work with many internet, media and production companies including AOL, ABC, Chase, Grey Interactive, PBS, EMG, Yahoo!, Ticketmaster, Biscuit, Elevation Filmworks and many Broadway productions.

Pro-bono work for the American Film Institute’s Digital Content Lab and NY Emmy Awards.
